alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:22PM CDT until June 29 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WALKER AND NORTHEASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 622 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Oakman to 7 miles north of Bankston, moving south at 60 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Carbon Hill, Berry, Oakman, Kansas, Nauvoo, Eldridge, West Corona, Cedrum Area, Fowlers Crossroads, Holly Grove, Lupton, Gamble, Corona and Townley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
